data.text:
If you want delicious food in a comfortable atmosphere, 
please come here!!!

People here really like Koreans (Korean culture).
Chindy in particular was so kind and comfortable with us.
We were so touched. 
Thank you Chindy!!!!!
She makes us happy~
data.title: Find Chindy!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Daydream16011605400, 

Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey. We are so happy that you had a great time in our hotel. 

Thank you as well for highlighting the services of our colleague Chindy, it mean a lot to us. 

We look forward to welcoming you once again and continuing to meet your expectations.
 
Thank you for choosing Jumeirah Mina A'Salam!

Kind Regards,

Jaime Simpson 
General Manager
Mina A'Salam
owner_response.author: Jaime Simpson

data.text:
Updated hotel review: I've been meaning to share my thoughts on this hotel since my last visit. Our family has been regular guests at this hotel for several years, often bringing along extended family members such as grandparents and cousins. The hotel itself and its amenities are fantastic, and we always felt secure during our stays. However, I have noticed that it has become more crowded in recent years.

Unfortunately, I must address a decline in the level of service and customer treatment. Firstly, when we requested a special arrangement for a specific date, something that had been accommodated in the past, this was overlooked during our last two visits. This, however, is not the main reason for my dissatisfaction. 

Secondly, when our flight was delayed, resulting in an extra night's stay, our experience was less than satisfactory. Despite notifying the hotel in advance due to the flight delay, we were informed that our room was not available for the extension. Instead, we were provided with a small alternative room for the daytime. We clarified that since we had a half-board arrangement, it would remain the same for the extension, to which we were initially told 'yes'. Consequently, we enjoyed our day, had some meals (paying for some, parts on the half-board). 

Upon check-out, the manager insisted that we pay for an additional dinner under the half-board plan, despite our prior confirmation. His demeanor was unpleasant, which understandably upset my husband. This added stress to an already challenging situation with the flight delay. The issue here is not the charge, it is a tone and we told otherwise initially (and overall booking arrangement that were were their for nearly 2 weeks)

Sadly, we haven't returned to this hotel for almost two years now. Whenever I think about Dubai, the memory of this poor treatment dampens my enthusiasm to book a stay. It's disheartening that a simple dinner charge could outweigh the significant amount we spent on accommodations and other services at the hotel. It's a shame that customer service standards have declined. Customers deserve better treatment.
data.title: Service need to improve and have the customer first attitude

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Anise, 

Greetings from Jumeirah Mina A'Salam.

Thank you so much for taking the time to write in detail about your experience with us. 

We sincerely apologize for the shortfalls you experienced during your visit. Rest assured that we will look into your 
comments and will take immediate action.

Kind regards,

Jaime Simpson
General Manager
Mina A'Salam
owner_response.author: Jaime Simpson

data.text:
Best service ever, Chindy and Cindy are very helpful and friendly. And the lobby as well so cozy , the pastries verry yummy ,its so recomended guys to try the experience dessert the best in dubai ,
The drinks its so refreshed and for sure they have execelent cookies and service .
data.title: The best lobby in town

data.text: Beautiful, renovated hotel in arabic style, friendly and helpful staff, fantastic beach and very nice pool area, excellent restaurants to choose. Best location in Dubai, Jumeirah. I will come back for the next holiday.
data.title: Mina A'Salam ist Paradies!

data.text: It was a perfect trip at Mina A'salam ! everything was perfect, the team is very attentive and quality of service, food, beach, are totally perfect ! I totally recommend to stay there if you are in Dubai !
data.title: Perfect stay !
